Key Match Events: Bahrain scored the first goal in the 15th minute via a 35-yard freekick by Mohamed Marhoon.
Ragnar Oratmangoen equalized for Indonesia in first-half stoppage time.
Rafael Struick gave Indonesia a 2-1 lead in the 84th minute with a sublime curling effort.
Mohamed Marhoon scored a last-minute equalizer for Bahrain in the 99th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Indonesia's captain Jay Idzes led the valiant defense in just his 6th cap.
Indonesia was denied a maiden victory in the third round of Asian qualifiers.
Indonesia's performance was considered creditable despite the late drama and controversy.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match ended in a 2-2 draw with six minutes of added time originally signalled by the fourth official.
An Indonesia official was shown a red card from the bench amid chaotic scenes.
